title: Loukoumades (Greek Honey Soaked Doughnuts)
ingredients: ['2 (7g) sachets dried active baking yeast', '250ml warm water', '125ml warm milk', '4 tablespoons caster sugar', '1 teaspoon salt', '75g unsalted butter, softened', '3 eggs', '500g plain flour', '175g honey', '125ml water', '1 litre vegetable oil or as needed', '2 teaspoons ground cinnamon']
